Once upon a time, there was a 3 year old boy named Simon. He was sitting in his playpen playing with his toys when he started feeling tingly. Then he started growing and he was smiling as everything around him was getting smaller. His onesie strained to keep up and soon ripped. Only his white diaper was growing with him. It wasn't long until he hit his head on the 1st floor's roof and then smashed through it. A few seconds later he hit his head against the 2nd floor roof. Then he smashed through the roof and kept growing. A few minutes later he stopped growing at 200 feet tall. He had obliterated his house and a neighbor's house. Many people were just staring at him and were panicking when they saw his diaper. Simon smiled as he saw toy buildings around and many bugs running away from him. He stood up and brushed rubble off his diaper.

He yelled out "New Toys". He walked over to a small building and stomped down on it. He giggled as it crumbled. The he sat down on another building and crushed it beneath his diaper. He turned to face a building that was a little taller than him. Dozens were staring at his massive diaper. Simon smiled and wrapped the building in a hug. He giggled as the building groaned and crumbled. Then Simon walked to another building around the same size. He turned around and smashed his butt through the building. He giggled as he sat amongst the rubble.

Simon felt nature calling and walked to another building. He told everyone to get out before he destroyed the building. People began running out in mass panic. Simon scooped them up and shoved them into his diaper. When he had dozens trapped inside, he ripped the building to shreds. He walked over to a 50 foot building and ripped off the roof. The people inside just looked up as Simon sat down on the building. First, he started peeing and the people inside his diapers desperately tried to swim in pee but they all drowned. Then he ripped a big fart and laughed. He pushed several logs into his diaper killing everyone inside. His diaper sagged into the building pinning the people in the building to the floor. The building groaned and crumbled to the ground. There was a crunch as most people inside his diaper were squished. Simon squished around in his full diaper, squishing any of the bodies that were left.

Simon laughed as he caused death and destruction with a full diaper. He stood back up and let his diaper sag several feet. He patted the seat of his diaper. He enjoyed the warm feeling of his blood stained diaper. He looked down at a group of little bugs and smiled. These people started running in a mass panic. Simon started chasing after them, leaving footprints in the street. Simon was gradually gaining on these people. As he caught up to them, he lifted up his foot and stomped it down on the crowd, squishing several people. He lifted his other foot and squished several more. The people screamed as a toddler’s foot came down and flattened them like pancakes. It hardly took a minute for him to squish every last little bug.

As he squished these people, the buildings stayed standing. Simon had an idea to change that. He walked over to one row of buildings. He lightly shoved the first building. It leaned over and collapsed into the building next to it. That building collapsed into the building next to it. These big buildings had been turned into dominoes by a giant kid. When the crumbling stopped, dozens of buildings had collapsed. Simon walked over to the other side of the street and did the same thing. He just laughed at the easiness of causing such destruction.

He noticed the bright lights of the city center. There were still dozens of buildings between him and his new target. These buildings were not going to stop this giant toddlers’ playtime. He walked up to the first in a line of buildings between him and the city center. The height of these building ranged from being level with the waistband of him diapers to being several stories taller than him.

The first building was the shortest of all. His diaper was pressed up against the building. The people inside the top floors were gagging from the smell of his massive diaper. Simon ripped the roof off the building and smiled at the bugs inside. Simon waved and said bye-bye to the little bugs. Simon stepped forward and smashed through the building, giggling as the building crumbled. He kept skipping along smashing buildings. The people in the floors that were level with his diaper got a quick view and sniff of his diaper before he smashed through the building.

Simon smashed into the city center with a smile on his face. He sat down on a building, and it crumbled beneath him. Then he targeted a building that reached his knees. He got down on his knees, put his hands on the building, pushed down, and the building crumbled. He got up and smiled as he destroyed another building by pulling it towards him. After that, he pushed another building to the ground. Then he stomped down on another. Simon walked down the street a bit and swung his hand back. His hand smashed through a few buildings. The people on the ground were running. Simon just smiled and shoved another building, again creating a domino effect. Then he did the same thing on the other side of the street.

Dozens of buildings were destroyed and the rubble trapped the citizens. Simon walked over to the trapped toys. The people looked up at the giant toddler’s sagging diaper. 155231.content:
Jason was a young 23 year old, college student for the past three years now. He'd lived a rather troubled life over the past few years. It seemed like everything had gone wrong for him since middle school - changing schools, losing all of his friends, dealing with bullies. He never was all that popular, and his older siblings flaunted their own popularity and success in his face. His siblings always used to bully him as well - he was the youngest of four children, and the smallest. His siblings always picked on him for being so small...that is until he got his growth spurt and became the tallest one in his family. It was at that time he'd realized the power that his size could give him.

Course Jason was no stranger to this; all throughout the stresses he'd discovered since adolescence, he'd figured out a way to relieve his tensions. He'd always had a latent size-fascination since childhood, but he didn't know it was a full on fetish until he started using the Internet; finding out there were people out there who shared his proclivity. He began reading several stories about size-changing; usually women becoming giantesses, and it wasn't long until he'd found several websites dedicated to some adulterated "artwork" of Giantess-Themed situations. Though throughout all that, he never really saw himself in place of the protagonist - he didn't fap to the idea of substituting himself with the victim. He saw the stories as a bit of a power-fantasy; imagining all the things he'd do if he were a giant - especially to all the people who wronged him. He would sometimes joke about being a giant in the Anime - Attack on Titan. He was sure he'd be the biggest and strongest Titan there. He knew that he was a pretty tall and intimidating guy, but being a true giant...no one would stand up to him.

But it was just a stupid power fantasy to him; after all, he didn't consider himself the type who would hurt anyone, even given the opportunity. Besides, even if he was, it's not like he could just grow in size one day. But that's the usual dialogue; nothing that Jason wanted ever went his way. He wasn't even able to go to the college he wanted to - he got accepted, but there were complications. He had a crappy apartment that smelled like a sewer, he didn't have a car so he had to walk everywhere he went, he was tired of having to take bullshit classes and he was fed up with his minimum wage job, where all of his customers trampled all over him. Jason didn't know why he bothered anymore; he didn't know what he would do after college, except be saddled with years of debt. And with no career in sight, if things didn't change for him, he often considered that suicide would be the only option left. But he never brought himself to it; he seemed too angry to go through with it, like it would be an admission of defeat. Jason soon realized that it was his anger that was keeping him alive. Too bad it couldn't fix his life.

Or could it?
155231.title: Jason - College Giant

1552311.content:
The incessant beeping snapped Jason out of his day-dream. He sighed and slowly dropped the dirty bacon-tray and his scour-pad. He walked back over to the drive-thru window, and listened as his coworker took the order at the front window. Sure enough, the car came around the corner, only for another car to quickly replace it. Jason hated this part of the job - he remembered that it used to be fun, but after the past three years, it just got tedious. Whenever a customer showed up here, it meant that an entire convoy was wrapped around the damn store. It wouldn't be so bad if the people would stop coming for about 10 minutes or so; but whenever they get started, they won't stop for nearly 3 hours. And Jason's job was split between taking these people's money AND washing the dishes; bad enough that the two stations were on separate ends of the store, but compounding the matter was that whenever the customers started, he had to stay put until they stopped, so that he wouldn't be able to get back to the sink. If he wasn't done by the end of his shift, he was forced to stay behind until they were done - without pay.

But of course, the worst part of this job was dealing with the impatient, self-important, over-entitled customers who came to his window, and harassed him whenever they don't get their way. And Jason was expected to - as he put it - 'take it in the ass', no matter how many times he got into trouble through no fault of his own...like right now.

"Jason!" he heard a voice call. He turned to see his manager, Clark, come around the corner. "The gentleman up there is saying you were giving him attitude."

"He ordered two desserts with his meal; our desserts are buy-one, get-one free, so he only had to pay half-price. But he kept expecting to pay full price for it; so I calmly explained to him about our sale...and he didn't believe me. He thought I was lying to him; God knows why. What the hell is going on, Clark? We've had this sale for over a month, and people are still ignorant about it; even though that fucking sign out there tells them about it out-right! I'm NOT responsible for these people's stupidity!"

"It doesn't matter, Jason," Clark said. "The customers are always right; which means stupidity is always right. And I'm tired of coming back here to remind you of that; just an hour ago, I had a customer complaining that you were losing your temper with him."

"That guy intentionally dropped his change on the ground and then demanded that I replace it for him!" Jason yelled. "You want my drawer to come up short at the end of my shift?"

"Keep taking that tone with me, and see what happens," Clark said.

"Yeah right; you're not going to fire me," Jason said. "After half the things I've pulled in this store, if you didn't fire me then, you're not firing me now. Plus, over the past three years, I'm the only person who has stuck around with you for this long. Want to get rid of one of your most loyal workers?"

"Alright smart-ass; just try to hold back for the rest of the day. And get those dishes done," Clark said.

"Yeah; next time that guy shows up here asking for dessert, I'll provide the cream-filling myself...special filling," Jason said under his breath.

--

"Look, I don't understand - why do I have to pay THAT much for my order?" stupid woman number 378 (for that day) asked Jason.

"You DID order four LARGE combos all with specialty sides; correct?" Jason asked after a quiet sigh.

"Yes," she said.

"Those combos are charged at $8.69 a piece and the specialty sides are $1.00 extra," Jason said. "And you ordered four of them."

"Yeah, but I don't see why I should have to pay ALL of that," the woman said. "That is way too expensive; I remember just last week, these same combos were only one dollar each."

"-No, they were not," Jason said. He'd been working here for three years, and yet he heard nonsense like this every week.

"Oh, did you just say 'No' to me?" she asked.

"-I think your biggest problem is that you haven't been told 'no' enough in your life," Jason said under his breath.

"What?!" she asked.

"You shouldn't say 'What' - it's very impolite," Jason smirked. A woman like her once used that saying on HIM a long time ago, and it really pissed him off; he was glad that he got to turn it around for once.

"I think you cranked up the price and are just trying to extort me," the woman said.

"Yes, I went through ALL that effort to just randomly target one self-entitled woman, who thinks she's owed a free meal," Jason said.

All the while, more customers had been coming through, and Jason knew that they were wrapped around the store. People waiting behind this bitch were honking their horns trying to get the line moving. And worse, the guy at the intercom was being a total douche-bag. He'd had four multiple orders, and each were incredibly long and very specific. Mandi was the one taking orders at the front, but the guy was going so fast, she couldn't keep up the order. And worse, he kept switching back an forth between the orders, making changes to his previous orders, and it was hard to keep them straight. And worse, he was losing his temper with Brandi when she asked him to repeat his order.

"I think I am being treated unfairly," the stupid woman continued.

"Are you going to pay for your food, or not?" Jason asked, losing his patience.

"I'm not paying that ridiculous price for just a few sandwiches," she said. "Especially not when its so obvious that you're trying to cheat me."

Jason was now getting really pissed and started to cringe; even this woman's grating voice was intolerable at this point.

"I've had enough of this; I want to speak to your manager, now," she said.

But Jason had begun to tremble with rage, gritting his teeth and clenching his fists. This woman's shrill voice, the honking cars, and the bastard over the intercom was decimating his last nerve. And then, finally came the last straw that broke the camel's back. Mandi was having trouble with the man's final order, and the guy went full asshole.

"No-no-NO! I said I wanted extra mayonnaise, not mustard! What is wrong with you, you stupid bitch?!"

Jason's eyes shot open, his blue eyes glowing brightly. He was used to getting spat upon by people coming to his window. But the idea that this guy had the gall to act this way over the intercom, to a girl who is trying her hardest no less, was too much for him to put up with. And the bitch at his window was still going on and on with her demands. Finally, Jason yelled, turning away from the window and throwing a punch at the nearby refrigerator. The fist actually dented the metal inward upon impact. But Jason didn't care about that - nor the sudden startled look on the bitch customer's face. Jason immediately left the register and turned to the back door of the restaurant. He immediately kicked the door open, breaking it off its hinges, startling the ranting bastard at the intercom.

The customers in line watched as Jason came out. He walked out of the restaurant and yelled at the top of his lungs. But it wasn't a yell...it was a roar; an inhuman, monstrous sound. And Jason wasn't even fully aware of himself anymore; he was just overcome with rage. He didn't even notice that he was growing taller, and his uniform was ripping at the seams. The man at the intercom saw this happening and began to panic. He tried putting his car in drive, only to rear-end the car in front of him. It was too late to escape anyway. Jason was almost 50 feet at this point. He reached out and grabbed the car, not even realizing what had been happening.

He lifted the car up to his face and saw that the man inside was alone. It pissed him off, knowing that one person shows up to order four different meals. He didn't say anything to the man, just stared at him with gritted teeth and enraged eyes. He then raised the car above his head and slammed it down onto the parking lot. The car began to crumple with every impact. Jason then gripped the car with both his hands and finished crushing it like wrapping paper. He then looked forward to see the drive-thru line scattering. The obnoxious bitch who commandeered the window was taking off. He threw the crushed car in his hands toward her car, landing just in front of it, forcing her to stop.

Jason approached the car as she tried to turn the other way. He grabbed the car and lifted it up. He pulled the roof off the car exposing the tiny woman inside. He reached inside and lifted her up, wrapping one hand around her. She was so terrified that she couldn't even scream, much less say anything in her defense. Jason growled at her before saying, "You wasted my time..."

He then tightened his grip on the woman, and before long, the pressure caused her body to pop like a grape; her blood rushing over Jason's hands. Jason opened his fist and let her entrails fall to the ground. He turned his head up and roared into the sky.
1552311.title: The Rage Giant

15523111.content:
Jason took some deep breaths and finally began to calm down. He slowly looked down and observed himself. He couldn't believe it; he was standing 50 feet off of the ground. His uniform had been torn up except for - oddly enough - his boxers and the crotch section of his pants. The elastic had somehow expanded to continue to fit him, but now they were incredibly tight; so tight that they now resembled little more than a speedo. But this wasn't the only thing different about him. Jason was fit, but he wasn't exactly athletic; but now it was clear that his muscles had much more definition. He had abs and his biceps were larger as well. He couldn't believe it; he was a giant!

Eventually the screams of the people around brought him out of his observation, He saw the cars that were trying to pull into the drive-thru were now turning around and driving away. The customers inside the restaurant were beginning to flee. Jason took a moment to consider; the sight of these people running for their lives was strangely empowering to him; maybe even slightly arousing. But it wasn't long until Clark and his other coworkers came outside and began staring up at him. Most of them were quiet, but Clark was getting very angry.

"Jason!" Clark said walking up to him. "What the Hell is going on here?! You're scaring away all our customers!"

Jason winced at hearing Clark speak to him. Clark usually took a loud and commanding voice, talking down to him before. But now, the man was the size of an action figure, and he was giving orders to a person nearly nine times larger than him. Was he delusional?

"I've had enough of your crap, Jason. You got problems with our customers; that's YOUR fault! But I can't have you holding us up; you're FIRED! Get off this property, NOW!"

Jason grit his teeth and began growling at Clark again; his blue eyes glowing. "Shut up, Clark - you uptight, arrogant, stupid, waste of space!" Without even thinking, Jason immediately lifted his foot and stomped it down on Clark. The man's body was crumpled as the giant foot came down. Jason then raised his foot and pulled it back, kicking what remained of his boss into the distance, taking out a portion of the restaurant with his foot.

Most of the other workers turned and ran. Jason looked at the rubble half of the restaurant had become. It was now that he was starting to get drunk on the power being giant was giving him. He didn't even care that he probably put his friends out of work or that he'd just killed three people. Why should he trouble himself with the likes of insects? Those that were still alive were lucky he let them exist in his world!

Jason then noticed that one of his coworkers hadn't run away yet. It was Mandi - she was a nice girl, who often joked around. But now she was terrified. Jason actually smiled seeing her terrified expression. He knelt down and got close to her. His grin was somewhat sinister and sadistic.
"Hey there, Mandi," he said - his voice was deep and shook her boy with each syllable.

"J-J-Jason...you just killed, Clark. You-You killed those people!" Mandi said.

"Eh, what can I say? They had it coming; that asshole at the intercom was being very rude; he called you a bitch. I couldn't let him get away with that," Jason said. "And the woman was trying to complain her way into a free-meal. And as for Clark...Heh, none of us liked him anyway."

"H-How did you get so...big?" she asked him.

"I don't know," Jason said. "I was really pissed off after listening to all this nonsense; and then something snapped. And now, I'm a big and powerful giant!"

"So you killed those people because you were angry?" Mandi asked. "That's insane!"

15523111.title: The Calm before the Storm

155231111.content:
No sooner than Jason was finished packaging Mandi in his bulge, did he soon hear the sirens coming his way. He wasn't surprised; the restaurant was pretty close to the fire-station. But soon he aw the flashing blue an red lights on the black cop cars roll into the parking lot. The police were here. Jason was taken aback for a moment; it suddenly all became real - he'd killed three people and just kidnapped some girl. Not to mention all the damage he'd caused. He was going to jail for sure. He was beginning to panic.

The cars pulled up and formed a blockade. The cops all got out of the cars, using them as barriers for cover.
"YOU!" the chief called out pointing his pistol. "Get down on your knees, and put your hands in the air!"

Then suddenly reality came back over Jason. Suddenly the illusion of authority that the police had always held over ordinary civilians like him was shattered. Jason knew that this was just a mortal man - several mortal men - the size of toys, trying to order him around. What threat did they really pose to him? Then again, there were a lot of them...and they did have guns. Was Jason really going to risk it? But his burning sense of curiosity overcame him...

"Or what?" Jason asked looking down at them. "What exactly do you plan to do if I surrender? You got a pair of handcuffs big enough for me, Chief? Got a holding cell the size of a foot-ball field waiting for me?"

"If you do not surrender, we will be open fire! Now get down on the ground and do not move; RIGHT NOW!" the Chief replied.

"P'feh, I don't think so," Jason scoffed. He started to turn toward the barricade, positive that the cops were too afraid to open fire on him.

"FIRE!" the Chief said shooting his gun. Soon the near two-dozen policemen began shooting all at the same time. Jason was startled by the loud noise and immediately tried to cover his head with his arms, certain they'd shoot there. He went down on one knee, to cover as much of his sensitive areas as possible and turned off to the side. He felt the forceful impact of the bullets hitting his body...and then the pain was gone as quickly as it came.

Jason opened his eyes. He didn't feel like his skin had been punctured at all. He just felt like he'd been hit with something small at high speeds, like someone had thrown a pebble at him. Some of them felt comparable to insect bites. But he was certain that they didn't break the skin. Soon the cops had emptied their pistols and stopped firing. They watched as Jason moved. They began reloading quickly, but some were stunned to see that Jason hadn't been hurt at all.

Jason was astonished. The bullets seemed more like a nuisance than an actual threat to him. He looked down at his arm and his side to see that the bullets had impacted on the surface of his body...but no blood was rushing out. The hollow-point bullets crumpled upon impact, but did no damage to him. Jason figured that because his relative size had increased, the top surface layer of his skin must've been so thick that it could stop bullets now. He couldn't believe it; he'd grown up watching Godzilla movies, where it seemed like Godzilla was immune to gunfire. His skin was so thick that they did nothing to him; and now, Jason himself was exactly the same. He couldn't be hurt by conventional weapons. He flexed the muscles of his arm and shook his side; and all of the impacted bullets were shaken loose and they fell down toward the ground, making various clinking sounds on the pavement as they rained down to the parking lot.

The cops were astonished by these events. And some held their guns at Jason, clearly trembling in fear about what to do next. Jason looked from his arm, over to them a bit curiously for a moment. Then he lifted his arm and swiped it across the line of cars, sending them all flying upward. The cops scattered, trying to avoid Jason. Some began firing on him. Jason either stomped on them or kicked them away. Jason picked up one of the cars and smashed it down on some of the police trying to flee.

"What a shame; I'm pretty sure that guy was just two days from retirement," Jason joked with a laugh. He felt so powerful dishing out cruelty like this. He truly felt invincible! And before long, all the police that had come to stop him were either dead or had fled. He swatted them away like flies. Jason was beginning to realize the true power he held; as long as he was like this, he was the most powerful thing in town.

But now, what should he do next?
155231111.title: Resisting Arrest

He had two older sisters and one older brother. Both sisters lived in the same state, and were pretty close by; so it was a smart idea to start with them. The oldest sister of the family was named Mabel - she was five years older than Jason and always used to pick on Jason for being the smallest one in the family...but the ironic thing is, as fully grown adults, she ended up being the shortest of the family. Maybe it was time to show her just how outclassed she really was.

The other sister was the third child in the family, Susan; she was three years older than Jason. She and Jason went to high school together. But she never really helped him with his problems. Plus, they both went into drama club together and were in some musicals during their school run. But it was clear that the drama teachers preferred her because she was pretty an could sing. But Jason was definitely a better actor than she was. Jason quietly reminded himself that he really should use his new size to get revenge on some of his old teachers too.

Of course, both of his sisters - now that they were adults - would constantly flaunt their wealth and success in his face; rubbing in the fact that they were accomplishing their careers and had actual houses to live in while he was stuck in an apartment. The fact that they had successful love-lives and were planning to get married. And of course, their belief that he should let go of the past and move on, even forcing him to get rid of all his old stuff.
The question is, which of his sisters to go after?
Susan was probably the closest. She lived in the next town just north, and by car it only takes 11 minutes to get there. Mabel lived south from here, and took about half an hour to get there.

So which one will he go after?
1552311111.title: Vengeance

"Sorry Stu, but that's not what I'm here for. I'm here for sister-dearest here," Jason said.

"Hey- what are you going?!" Stu asked as Jason began to pick him up. "What's the meaning of this?!"

"What do you want with us?" Susan asked.

"Simple - you guys have been quite rude to me as of late, and I want some payback," Jason said.

"Rude? How?!" Susan asked.

"You guys are always flaunting how much more successful than you guys are than me. And that is a display of power. A totally emasculating display that I really don't care for," Jason said.

"How?" Susan asked.

"You guys have two of each of the the latest generation of video game consoles. You set them all up in the same room so that you both can play the same consoles at the same time, without having to play with each other."

"So you're jealous because we can afford nice things?" Susan asked.

"But then you reneged on the deal and brushed it off like it was no big deal. You bought the latest generation consoles, but you kept the old ones despite being obsolete. You got my hopes up, and took it away."

"Well I'm sorry you feel that way, but it's our decision to do with our property what we wish," Susan said.

"But it's more than that; you guys show me a general lack of respect. Every time we hang out, you guys treat me like I'm some kind of intruder or third wheel; you make me feel left out for not having a date, or for being too ugly, or not being fit enough. You make me feel like I don't belong."

"Listen Jason...I'm sorry that's how we made you feel. But please understand that, we didn't mean to make you feel like that. It wasn't our intention at all. We just hoped it would galvinize you into going out more often, and maybe you would meet someone."

"Oh shut-up, Stu," Jason said. "You're not getting off so easily; I came for you just as much as I did my sister. You are a spoiled and self-entitled, passive-aggressive brat who whines and complains until he gets his way. You say that you wish you had siblings when you were a kid? Guess what, pal; if you had as many siblings as I did, you would've gotten NONE of the great stuff you did as a kid."

"Every single time we have a family get together, we always do what YOU want to do. You're not happy unless you're in control. And you act like an annoying little cunt until you get what you want," Jason retorted.

I noticed how your relationship with her is on our last family trip...You might act like a prissy little bitch whenever the rest of us are around. But when you think you're alone with my sister? He released her waist and lifted up his tongue, sliding it under the opening of her legs. The legs had been pushing against his chin, trying to get her upper-half free. But when the huge tongue invaded her nethers and cupped around her ass, her knees tensed before going weak. She was slurped up easily.

It wasn't much longer before he swallowed her as well. He'd played around with the blonde longer, but now he was so curious about something, and was anxious to test his theory. He then quickly reached down and reached toward the red-haired girl. He ripped off her shirt before pinching her with his thumb and finger. He lifted her up from out of his toes. He wasted no time and gave no pretext. He unceremoniously tossed her into his mouth completely and closed down. His eyes shot wide - a spicy and sweet combination flooded his taste buds. She tasted like gingerbread...Ginger-spice. He gave a slight chuckle before swallowing her.

All three girls had been taken care of. He could feel them reunited in his stomach, thrashing about; but the thrashes were dying down. But it was apparent that he was still hungry. He needed more. But what should he do now?
1552311111111.title: Predator and Prey

choices: A cadre of military vehicles (The National Guard had arrived)
Animal Control rolling in, with a giant net
15523111111111.content:
Mabel sat in her living room on her laptop while her fiance, Leroy was flipping through the channels. He landed on the news where a special emergency report was being given.

"The City is under emergency-alert as widespread panic and riots have broken out in the northern city-limits. Panic-stricken reports roll-in, claiming that a giant man has appeared and gone on a rampage, destroying buildings and cars and terrorizing the people. Unfortunately, none of these claims can be substantiated due to the fact that no communication seems able to get in or out of the city. Various testimonies from anyone who sees the giant man and lives to talk about it, claim that being in his presence causes an electrical distortion, destroying all electronic devices in the area. We now go to a live chopper-feed trying to get a good look at the supposed 'giant'."

The view switched to a camera crew inside of a helicopter. The camera panned over the streets down below, where throngs of people were abandoning their cars and running for their lives.
"As you can see down below, pandemonium has broken loose. People have abandoned their vehicles and are now running for their lives away from some unseen threat. Wait, what's that up ahead? Oh my god; it's true. It really is a giant humanoid-creature. It looks like a young man. He seems to be maybe 60; no, 75 feet tall. We're going to fly in to try and get a closer look."

The camera was trying to get into position to get a good shot, when suddenly the helicopter began to malfunction. The vehicle teetered a bit and the camera was tossed about. "The controls on our chopper have gone dark. We're trying to stay in the air. Wait - wait, the Giant is coming towards us. He's - OH MY GOD!"

The camera turned one last time, and the giant came into view, jumping at the Helicopter and roaring. A huge fist flew toward the camera and struck the side of the chopper, sending it into a tail-spin, until it finally crashed. It was so quick that those watching the feed couldn't get a good enough view of what happened.

"This is most disturbing news indeed, ladies and gentlemen," the anchorwoman continued. "The mayor has declared a state of emergency; requiring that all civilians either evacuate or take shelter immediately."

"What the hell is going on?" Mabel asked having watched the news report. "You think we should leave?"

"No way," Leroy said. "It's a hoax - can't you tell? It's obvious. They're probably just trying to advertise that new King Kong movie or something."

"Oh...Well I guess that makes sense," Mabel said. "After all, how could a giant man possibly just appear out of nowhere? Who would be silly enough to believe such a thing?"

--

People were screaming as they ran for their lives. Jason was chasing a whole herd of people down the street. When he'd first gone on the hunt, his EMP was causing their engines to die. Most people didn't know what was happening, and stayed in their cars to try and fix the problem, and some others eventually tried to use their cars to hide. They were the easy pickings for Jason; he tore the roofs off their cars and pulled them out. It was almost like a packaged lunch; that's exactly what these people were for anyway - at least as far as Jason's mind could rationalize. Anyway, Jason was surprised to find such a variety of flavor when it came to these morsels. He wasn't discriminating from anyone; man or woman, race; as far as he was concerned, food was food. And the vast array of taste sensation actually made him consider them to be different types of cuisine. One gentleman had the texture of dark turkey-meat. Another young lady had spicy flavor to her. They were all so delicious. Though, Jason had to admit, he probably preferred the blonde's taste above all others. He was sure to pick them out when he'd spotted them in the crowd.

Jason had became so overzealous that he eventually did something he didn't expect he'd do; in his vigor to get to the next victim, he'd bit one man in half below the waist. The man screamed in agony as his lower half was separated from his body; blood gushing from the wounds, and the man's organs began to fall out. Ordinarily this would've turned Jason's stomach; he was never one for gore. And in fact, as a child, the sight of blood made him squeamish. But now that he was a giant cannibal, a completely new attitude came over Jason. He honestly couldn't believe it, but the man's blood tasted wonderful! The flavor delighted him! He'd remembered in the past that blood usually had a metallic almost iron taste to it. But this man's blood was almost like barbecue sauce!

He tossed the remaining half-man into his waiting maw and chewed him up before swallowing. He was surprised that the bones gave a very satisfying crunch when he bit down; he'd always loved food that 'crunched' in such a fashion. Jason couldn't believe he hadn't tried that sooner. Since he started, he'd been swallowing his victims whole. For a moment he thought about how morbid that was; he was effectively sending these people into a cauldron of boiling acid to be digested alive. And although their tiny movements inside of his body gave him such a satisfying arousal, he deemed that it was cruel. Killing them outright would be quicker and painless. If he even still cared about that; at most he deemed that it was more wasteful; he didn't get to experience their full flavor that way.

Before long, he began snatching up more victims to crunch-down on. Tossing them into his mouth, grinding them up under his teeth. Jason felt absolutely great while doing it. The screams of the people rang-out, like music to his ears; the fear, the adrenaline, the satisfaction of the chase; they were all feeding his desires to continue. Stu and Susan on the other hands were sickened by what they were seeing. It was truly obscene. And they were powerless to stop it; for now, they remained Jason's prisoners.

Jason tossed one last woman into his mouth, chewing on her before swallowing. That is when he felt his stomach gurgle. He hardly noticed it because of the predatory thrill he'd been receiving, but he no longer felt any hunger-pains. He felt completely satisfied. He was completely full. Jason smiled and patted his washboard abs. He then threw his head back, unleashing a dominant roar that was heard by all in the area. Immediately after, Jason gave a slight belch, signifying his satisfaction.

Jason took a moment to realize that all of the people had fled; must've taken shelter somewhere. It seemed he'd gotten full just in time. Oddly enough, the thought that all his prey were cowering in the shadows like vermin, excited Jason even further. Throughout most of his life, he was the one who had to get out of the way of other people; the one who had to deal with them being there. But now the streets were quiet and empty; he could finally enjoy the peace...

But this peace was short-lived as a new sound approached from the distance...Jason looked toward the source of the sound and saw -
15523111111111.title: Street Buffet

choices: No it can't end like this! He gets back up!
Maybe something else can happen instead of him dying. (Use THIS one)
155231111111111.content:
The streets were buzzing to life again as a several heavy vehicles began to approach from up the road. There were trucks mounted with missile launchers, and some hum-vs outfitted with machine guns, and even a few tanks. There was a whole artillery coming here. Jason suspected that now the National Guard had mobilized to take him down. He was a bit alarmed by seeing them, until he remembered when he was attached by the police. Their weapons did nothing to him. But then again, they only had pistols; he wasn't sure how he'd hold up against explosive missiles and more powerful guns. But then again, at this size, they shouldn't feel any worse than simple firecrackers.

He took notice of how the vehicles were lining up; forming a blockade, ready to attack him. Several men carrying automatic weapons began lining up and taking formation, aiming their guns at him. He looked down at them all; they didn't to be worried or nervous at all; nothing like the cops. Jason began to wonder if they even saw him as human anymore or just a wild animal. He took notice of how a man with a megaphone stepped forward to address him.

"Attention! Stand-Down or be fired upon!" the man shouted.

Jason smirked at hearing the man's tiny voice; even amplified by the device, he still sounded so pathetic. All of Jason's fears melted away as he was reminded just where he stood in relation to these men. He knew they couldn't hurt him. So he might as well have some fun with this. He then remembered that he was holding his sister and her boyfriend in his fist.

"I've got two civilians in my hand here; you wouldn't want them to get caught in the cross-fire would you?" he asked.

"Let the hostages go, and stand-down," the commander shouted.

Jason wasn't going to back down, but he certainly didn't want his trophies to get damaged. He walked over to the roof of a nearby car-dealership. There was no staircase that lead down to the lower levels, so he dropped Stu and Susan onto the roof.
"Stay right there!" he ordered. The two of them cringed as their bodies regained their shape after being painfully squeezed in his hand. They looked around the roof, hoping to find some way to get down, but there didn't seem to be a stairwell or a ladder to get down. The two of them wondered if they can jump from the roof to get away.

Jason stepped away from the building and stood in the center of the street and opened his arms.
"Well go on," Jason said. "Give me your best shot. But I guarantee you; it's not going to end well for you."

"Hold the line, men!" the commander ordered. The men simply raised their guns, taking aim.

"Oh? So you're not going to shoot?" Jason said. "Fine then; I'll make the first move. Let's play!" Jason took a step forward, getting ready to swing his arms.

"FIRE AT WILL!!!" the commander shouted. And suddenly every single gun was fired; several flashing lights and booming sounds flooded the area. Jason soon felt the tiny stinging pricks against his body. He grinned, staying confident that they didn't effect him much like the police bullets hadn't...But he couldn't deny that he did feel something. This was slightly more painful.

"OPEN FIRE!" the Commander said, gesturing to the artillery. The heavy guns of the tanks turned on Jason and fired at him. Huge booming explosions and flashes of fire erupted from the barrels. An enormous shell struck Jason in the chest, the impact causing an explosion. Jason was caught off guard. That wasn't the slight firecracker he was expecting it to be...That really hurt.

The impact caused him to stagger backward, as the rest of the artillery took aim. Another tank shot at his leg, striking him in the side of the knee. Jason went down onto the knee and grabbed it, feeling the painful shock. Soon the missile launchers unleashed their payload. Jason looked toward the noise and saw them all coming in at him at top speed. One struck him in the shoulder, the explosion hurting badly, sending high speed shrapnel digging into his skin. Another hit him in the chest. The third in the stomach. And Jason knew this was hardly the end. The impacts were so hard, that he actually had begun to cough up blood. And a horrific moment of clarity struck Jason...He was going to die...

The rest of the missiles flew in and struck him in the chest, and the explosion was so great that he was pushed off of his feet and went flying into the air, down the street, a trail of smoke and the smell of burning flesh left behind.

--

Stu and Susan had ducked for cover, holding each other when the shooting started. At any moment they expected to hear the vehicles crashing and being sent flying away. There were several explosions. Smoke flew over the scene. And the shooting had stopped. They looked over the edge of the building. They saw Jason had been knocked into the air; he had been brought down. His body impacted on the ground and he wasn't moving. Susan was shocked for a moment. She believed that it had finally been stopped, but the gravity of her brother being dead finally sunk in. She didn't want anyone to die, even him. But he had done so many horrible things; he had to be taken down. But he was dead now...How should she feel?"

--

"He's down!" the Commander said speaking into his radio, only to hear static from the other end. "Alright men, pull up! Make sure he stays down."

The troops began to slowly move forward, still in formation to check on Jason's body. During his fall, Jason had turned and he now laid on his side. He didn't look to be breathing, and his body was smoking. He wasn't moving. He was still alive, but he was in a great deal of pain. He honestly didn't know where he went wrong. After everything that happened, how could he still be vulnerable? Did he overestimate himself? His imagined invincibility because of his size and power? And was this how it ended?
155231111111111.title: Artillery Assault

1552311111111111.content:
Everything began to go dark as Jason felt himself slipping and slipping out of consciousness. He was dying. After he'd become so powerful and done so much, it was over. But...Jason wracked whatever was left of his brain going over how unfair it was. He'd only just gotten started; there was so much he wanted to do, so much revenge he'd wanted to reap. It wasn't fair; he couldn't be done already. He wanted so much more; he had to gain so much more!

Jason tried so hard to move; to do something as simple as clench his fists. But he couldn't move as he felt himself slip further into the darkness. It seemed hopeless and he was doomed; and it infuriated him. He was screaming inside his own head; a heated rampage like a tantrum storming inside as he slipped deeper and deeper. And then he saw it...
There was a blue light that suddenly pierced meekly through the darkness. And Jason began to panic; that was the light at the end of the tunnel. No; he couldn't go into the light. Not now; he wanted so badly to live! He had so much more he wanted to do. But despite how much he tried to will himself to move, he slipped further into the dark. And the deeper he sank, the larger the light source became as he was moved toward it...

And then Jason examined it. He found that the light source was not an opening in a tunnel of darkness. No, it was actually an electrical spark sending blue light into the darkness with each pulse. But the sparks were weakening and the light was dimming. Jason was now curiously intrigued by this spark. He felt oddly warm as he was by it; a warmth that spread throughout his entire body. It was almost like this light was the spark inside of him; the thing that gave him the power. And it was buried so deep down inside of him. He reached out to grab it; he finally clasped his hands around it, feeling the warming electric feeling pulse through his entire body.

--

"Be on guard," one of the soldiers shouted. "We have to make sure he stays down."

"Is he even still alive?" another asked.

"I doubt it; after taking all those shells at point blank range, he must be dead."

"Hardly any blood though; the guy must be tough."

The soldiers poked and prodded Jason's body with their guns, hardly receiving a reaction.
"Looks like he's down for good colonel."

"Alright men, secure the area," the colonel ordered. "Get on the phone to Washington. I have a feeling that the science-types are going to want to examine the corpse. Get a clean-up crew out here with a net and a few helicopters; we're going to have to air-lift it out of here."

"I wonder what they'll find out about this thing," his Lieutenant stated.

"Well we'll just have to wait until they cut him open and see..."

Jason felt the life return to his body as his eyes shot open wide. He could move his hands again. Almost immediately he roared and swiped his arm in front of his face, knocking back any soldier unfortunate enough to still be close enough.

"Jesus Christ, it's alive!" the colonel said. "Fire all; keep it down!"

But Jason was already in the process of standing up; his eyes were now glowing blue, much like they had when this began. Only now, in addition to the glow, they could see sparks of electricity discharging from his eyes. He rose to his feet roaring. Tiny blue static bolts were sparking across his body now; it was like he was covered in an electrical field. He roared loudest that he'd had all day.

The soldiers took aim with their guns only for the electrical sparks across Jason to arch toward their metal guns, shocking those holding them. Worse, the intense heat of the lightning was making their shells discharge while still in the clip. The men had to abandon their weapons and flee.

Those brave enough to look back as they ran for the artillery line, could see a most disturbing sight; Jason was growing. In his rage, the influx of power was causing Jason to increase in size. He quickly left his 75 foot height and shot up to a staggering 100 feet tall. His voice was deeper and monstrous; something inhumane inside of him had been awoken. Jason had now surpassed the simplistic 1950's B-Movie Monster and had evolved into something far more dangerous.

"OPEN FIRE!" the Colonel shouted to the artillery. The heavy guns shot off again, aiming at Jason; now taking careful aim to hit his face. Only now when the explosive shells struck Jason's body, there was no recoil. Jason wasn't stunned; he wasn't even phased by their weapons any more. The only response he gave was to now turn his glowing, enraged, blue gaze onto the row of tanks and military vehicles. He roared at them now taking a step forward.

"Fall back! Move the line; keep firing!" the Colonel ordered.

The artillery moved back, continuing to barrel their heavy shells and explosives upon the giant; but it was completely feeble as Jason continued to advance on them. He would occasionally wince at an explosion going off too close to his eyes, but other than that, he seemed a completely different creature than the vulnerable giant he was before.

And then as Jason's rage grew, he did something that was most unexpected. Jason roared loudly as his rage grew; his eyes shined brightest that they had done yet. And then without warning, two brilliantly blue bolts of lightning shot from Jason's eyes. They struck the heavy weapon's vehicle off to the right, completely destroying it in a huge explosion that almost knocked the other vehicles over.

"What the hell?!" the Colonel yelled.

"He's developed some kind of projectile, sir!"

"Retreat! Retreat!"

The vehicles were in a mad scramble to turn around as quickly as they can and flee the area, with Jason continuing to advance on them, firing lightning as he did. The puny soldiers were now fleeing for their lives after their haughty boasts of cutting him up for experiments earlier on. Jason was even more enraged by their cowardice; fleeing from him after such an attack, now that they had lost the upper hand. They needed to be punished.

Jason roared and brought his hands up; the lightning around his body now focusing purely on his arms. He brought his fists above his head before slamming them down on the ground around him. Suddenly an incredible shock-wave in the form of a dome spread out from the epicenter of where Jason struck the asphalt. The wave was accompanied by several bolts of lightning, all shooting from Jason's body at once.

The wave struck the vehicles and surprisingly did not send them flying. The vehicles instead immediately shut down and ceased to function; the shock wave was an EMP blast. The lightning in the wave however caused several of the vehicles to suddenly be pushed off of the ground and sent flying in several directions, slinging the puny men inside of them all around as well. The electricity was soon to overcome their pathetic forms.

The colonel was among the few who survived the attack. Wincing in pain after being tossed from his truck, he looked around to witness the carnage. He could see how his men were convulsing from the electrical attack; he was fortunate to have effectively been paralyzed by it...whereas his not so fortunate men, were being cooked alive by the lightning. The colonel began to tremble as the realization was coming over him; this was the end.

He painfully turned his head to look forward and could now see Jason standing at full height above them. And the last thing to go through the Colonel's mind was how such a creature could exist...and how he was surely the end of human civilization as they currently knew it.

And when Jason saw the Colonel's eyes meeting his, the rage returned as he curled his upper lip in a growling sneer. He snapped his head forward again, shooting lightning bolts from his eyes, directly at the Colonel - incinerating the man - before dragging the bolts across the convoy of ruined vehicles, causing them all to vanish in several fiery explosions. When Jason was finished, there was nothing left of his opponents...

Jason surveyed his handiwork through his glowing blue eyes. His lips trembled as he grit his teeth. His muscles tensed as the electrical power sparked and danced over them. He could not in his wildest dreams have believed it. The power he'd had before was nothing; but this...he could not have fathomed he was capable of it. He grew even larger, the weapons that once hurt him now did nothing, and he developed a new weapon to attack the infidels who opposed him. He was truly indestructible now...
It was clear to Jason that he'd now long since left humanity behind. He was no mere giant cannibal...he wasn't even a monster. No, there was only one description of him now that truly fit him...

He truly was a God on Earth...

The revelation overcame Jason as he threw his head back and roared his inhuman shriek to the sky, drowning out all other sounds in the area over his incredible voice; a testament to his power.
1552311111111111.title: Back with a Vengeance

155231111111112.content:
Jason stands there in wonder as some animal control vehicles, police cars, and a swat team van approach him. He even sees some National Guard Black-hawk helicopters approaching his position carrying a very large net. The combined attack forces have orders to capture him alive for study. He even sees some Apache helicopters, some military Abrams tanks, and some transport vehicles carrying heavy infantry heading towards him. “They managed to scrape up quite large force to subdue the giant,” one TV reporter on the street tells her camera crew.

A minute later, the reporter, a beautiful, 28 year old busty blonde-haired woman in a tight fitting suit tells her TV audience, “I cannot believe this. All of the aircraft have suddenly lost power, and crashed. Any missiles fired at him just fall to the ground before getting anywhere near him and detonate. The tanks stopped working just before they could get in range. Some of the missiles are falling to the ground and exploding on top of the stalled tanks, oh the horror. I can see most of the tanks are now on fire. I see tank crews abandoning the tanks and running for their lives. I can now see military, animal control, and police ground units opening fire on the giant. They seem to be using rubber bullets and elephant size tranquilizer darts. None of it seems to be penetrating his thick skin. I see the giant now grabbing the giant net and throwing it over the police and troops.”

“What is happening now Kate?” an anchor says nervously.

“I cannot believe it, the net is trapping the troops and cops. The giant now seems to be river dancing?” the stunned reporter says.

“Well, what’s wrong with that?” the anchor asks.

The giant is just laughing while river dancing over the troops and cops, crushing them like grapes,” she says nervously.

“I can’t believe it. The giant has beaten the police and the military. I have now received word that the Air Force will be sending in some heavy bombers that are shielded against EMP attacks. I am advised to seek shelter, but I am staying here to cover this story. I see the bombers above and they are dropping their payloads. The giant seems to be flipping off the bombers as the bombs start to go off all around him. I see the giant engulfed in fire. I now see a blinding flash of light, and now I see nothing, the giant is gone. The bombs must have gotten him,” the reporter says in a relieved voice.

A split second later, Jason and his tiny captives reappear somewhere else, completely unharmed. Jason teleported about 50 miles away right before the bombs could harm him. “That was fun, and I discovered a new power. Anyways, I am starting to get hungry again.”

Jason is presumed dead for now as he rests in a lush forest surrounded by many tall trees and some mountains. To the East, he sees some nice homes, a town, and a nudist camp for youths next to the ocean. To the West, he sees some tents, a cheerleader camp, and in the distance, a small city. As Jason rests before the hunt, he suddenly turns invisible. At first, this naturally alarms him as he looks through his hand, but soon he realizes what is happening and smiles wickedly. Another power discovered as he becomes visible again.

A few minutes later, Jason goes where?
155231111111112.title: A Giant Net and some River Dance.

1552311111111121.content:
The tiny captives in his pants are still alive a kicking as Jason stands up and decides to keep a low profile for now. After he fully masters his powers, only then will he will go back into a major population center. The seventy-foot tall young man looks around and decides to go east. Jason carefully walks through the trees, attempting to keep a low profile, but unfortunately, he is as stealthy as a bull elephant in a pottery shop. To help keep himself from being seen, Jason turns himself invisible. He may be a bit loud, but at least he cannot be seen.

Jason walks on his tippy toes when he comes across a two-story farmhouse. The now invisible giant is leaving a trail of huge, bare footprints behind him as he sneaks up to the house. While he gets closer, he reaches down and eats a few cows, along with some pigs. Jason never knew it, but pigs taste a lot like humans. Jason then gets up to the house and peaks into a window, and luckily for him, this family never closes their curtains.

He observes a young, blonde haired boy wearing only boxers sitting on the floor of his bedroom playing a game. The boy looks like he is around 12 years old. He peeks into another window and sees two girls with long blonde haired talking to each other. The girls are just wearing panties and long t-shirts. They look like they are sisters; one looks like she is around 10 years old and the other looks as if she is around 14. Jason peeks into a third window and sees a lovely, nude, pregnant girl walking around her bedroom. She has blonde hair too, and looks like she is around 16 years old. Yummy he thinks to himself. He then peeks into another window and gasps. He sees a gorgeous, buck-naked, thirty something couple passionately making love on their bed. The woman is riding her husband like a cowgirl and they are both moaning loudly. Jason…


Feel free to add.
1552311111111121.title: Jason goes East
